alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:55PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Las Animas County through 315 PM MDT... At 255 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles southeast of Thatcher, or 37 miles east of Trinidad, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Las Animas County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
